hadith.text: It was narrated that Malik bin Mighwal said:"I heard Ash-Sha'bi say: 'Alqamah bin Qais forgot (and made a mistake) in his prayer, and they told him about that after he had spoken, He said: 'Is that true, O odd-eyed one?' He said: 'Yes.' So he undid his cloak, then he performed two prostrations of forgtfulness,and said: 'This is what the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) did.' He said: And I heard Al-Hakam say: 'Alqamah had prayed five
